content: diagonale is a unique hat constructed very simply ideal for beginner knitters who aren t ready to dive into crown shaping but want to practice their increases and decreases this design is ideal for any type of yarn as well as the 4 sizes included for sock weight the pattern also contains a tutorial to guide you through making the hat in any size with any weight yarn **yarn** 100g/361yd/330m handdyed 4ply or sport weight yarn **needles & notions** pair 3mm/uk11/us2½ straight needles or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** shown in woolworxx bfl fingering 390yd/357m per 100g 100% bluefaced leicester shown in size 23in/58 5cm on model with 21 5in/54 5cm circumference head **gauge** 24 sts x 48 row to 4in/10cm on 3mm needles over garter st **sizes** to fit sizes 16 18 21 23 in/ 40 75 45 75 53 25 58 5 cm finished size 14 16 18 20 in/ 35 5 40 75 45 75 50 75 cm **skills required** garter stitch mattress stitch for garter stitch increases & decreases **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour **support** do you need help with this pattern please pop over to the specific discussion thread in my group 3 1 https //www woollywormhead com/the-woolly-hat-society 2 https //www patreon com/woollywormhead 3 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/4015616
